conbody.p: The Charging application allows you to provision the entities related to policy and entities related to charging, which provides the configuration of counters, thresholds, caps, lifecycles, unit mapping, currencies, mapping tables, and external SPRs.
Operators can configure charging using the Bundles, Charging services, Rates, Rules And Variables, Slicing Profile, and Category Consumption Order options available in the Charging tab on the SM GUI.
